name: Ducks and Cats
description:
Ducks And Cats

This is a collection of four small and easy games.

To select game - swipe screens!

1. Select the right color to remove angry UFO stealing ducklings from the farm! More you hit, more they come! On PC use mouse to click buttons.

2. Drive the tram through the city. Use pedals to stop(left) and go(right). Brake before pedestrians and crossroads! To remove pedestrians - signal the horn(BIG RED BUTTON) On PC use Up arrow to throttle and Down arrow to brake. Press Space to Honk.

3. Save the cat from the flood. Use key buttons to jump small cat from balcony to balcony and avoid dogs and falling garbage.  On PC use arrows to navigate.

4. Cowbows  game for two players. Hit the stick before the opponent to eat the right food. Be careful , there are some noneatable things! On PC press Z for blue player and P for red player.


Have fun and enjoy!

(Use last screen to turn on and off sounds and chage easy/hard mode.)

P.S. There is also a free2play game version with 15 min rest timer on GooglePlay

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nvsarge.kiddo
